articles.author: By DANICA KIRKA Associated Press
articles.title: Health officials trace British patient travels in outbreak
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — A middle-aged businessman from England who vacationed in the Alps has illustrated how the ease of international travel is complicating global efforts to track and contain the new coronavirus that emerged in China.

articles.title: Dream send Sykes, Gülich to Sparks, get 6--7 Kalani Brown
articles.description: ATLANTA (AP) — The Atlanta Dream have added size to their lineup by acquiring center Kalani Brown from the Los Angeles Sparks for guard Brittney Sykes and center Marie Gülich.
articles.content:
ATLANTA (AP) The Atlanta Dream have added size to their lineup by acquiring center Kalani Brown from the Los Angeles Sparks for guard Brittney Sykes and center Marie Gülich.

articles.title: Sony, Amazon drop out of major European tech show over virus
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Sony and Amazon are the latest companies to pull out of a major European technology show due to fears over the outbreak of the new coronavirus.

articles.title: Chinese women win again in Olympic qualifying tournament
articles.description: SYDNEY (AP) — The Chinese women's soccer team has won back-to-back games in the Olympic qualifying tournament after spending almost two weeks quarantined in an Australian hotel because of concerns over the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: UK calls virus "serious" health threat; will detain people
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Britain has declared the new coronavirus that emerged from China a "serious and imminent threat to public health'' and announced new measures Monday to combat the spread of the disease.

articles.title: Mainland China virus cases rise again after earlier decline
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — Mainland China reported another rise in cases of the new virus Monday after a sharp decline the previous day, while the number of deaths grew by 97 to 908, with at least two more outside the country.

articles.title: Brazilians repatriated from China begin quarantine
articles.description: Dozens of Brazilians repatriated from Wuhan, China, epicenter of a new virus, landed Sunday at an airbase in the Brazilian state of Goias, where they will spend the next 18 days in quarantine.

articles.title: LPGA Tour cancels 2 more Asia tournaments due to coronavirus
articles.description: The LPGA Tour has canceled two more tournaments in Asia because of the coronavirus, knocking out three of the five tournaments that comprise its first international swing.
